titles.title: To designate the Village of Sunbury, Ohio, as "Flagville, U.S.A.".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 7/18/1996--Introduced. Designates the Village of Sunbury, Ohio, as Flagville, U.S.A. Authorizes the President to call on the people of Sunbury to display the U.S. flag on national holidays and regularly during the year.
